entry.title: Putin Orders Deployment of Troops to Breakaway Regions in Ukraine
entry.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin earlier recognized their independence, escalating tensions with the West.

entry.title: Putin's Endgame: Unravel the Post-Cold War Agreements That Humiliated Russia
entry.content: Moscow’s military forces threaten Ukraine, but the bigger prize is restoration of Russia’s historical sphere of influence stretching through Eastern Europe.

entry.title: In East Ukraine, Life Under Shelling Becomes Untenable for Many
entry.content: As tensions have flared in recent days between the West and Russia over Ukraine, the people of towns along the front line have taken the brunt of the escalation, prompting many to flee.
